sentences.en: Every care has been taken in compiling this list.
sentences.cn: 汇编这份清单时考虑得很充分。

sentences.en: Get hold of the company list from your careers advisory service.
sentences.cn: 到就业指导处领取企业名录。

sentences.en: He had been on the Nobel Prize committee's list of possibles.
sentences.cn: 他在诺贝尔委员会列出的获奖候选者名单之列.

sentences.en: He was knighted in the Queen's birthday honours list in June 1988.
sentences.cn: 他于1988年6月被封为爵士，是女王生日宴会上的受勋者之一。

sentences.en: High on the list of public demands is to end military control of broadcasting.
sentences.cn: 高居公众要求事项前列的是结束对广播的军事控制。

sentences.en: I've managed to narrow the list down to twenty-three.
sentences.cn: 我已设法把清单上的项目压缩到了23项。

sentences.en: It is appropriate that Irish names dominate the list.
sentences.cn: 名单上大部分是爱尔兰名字，这没什么不合适的。

sentences.en: List the key headings and sort them into a logical order.
sentences.cn: 列出关键标题并按逻辑顺序排列。

sentences.en: Make a list of all the things you have to do.
sentences.cn: 把你必须做的所有事情列一个清单。

sentences.en: Manufacturers must list ingredients in order of the amount used.
sentences.cn: 生产商必须按用量多少的顺序将成分列出。

sentences.en: Now what about that shopping list? I've got to get going.
sentences.cn: 那张购物清单呢？我得出发了。

sentences.en: Packaged foods have to show a list of ingredients.
sentences.cn: 包装食品必须列出食品成分。

sentences.en: She added her name to the list on the noticeboard.
sentences.cn: 她把自己的名字加在了布告栏上的名单里。

sentences.en: She has been deliberately left off the guest list.
sentences.cn: 她被故意排除在嘉宾名单之外。

sentences.en: The criminal judicial system always comes up at the top of the list of voters' concerns in focus groups.
sentences.cn: 刑事司法制度总是出现在焦点小组中投票者关注事项之首。

sentences.en: The first person on my list is Mrs Gilling.
sentences.cn: 我的名单上排在第一位的是吉林夫人。

sentences.en: The guidebook lists 1,000 hotels and restaurants.
sentences.cn: 旅游手册上列有1,000家宾馆和餐厅。

sentences.en: The list of drinks, a dozen pages long, makes fascinating reading.
sentences.cn: 酒水单一共有十几页长，读起来很有趣。

sentences.en: The list of past champions includes many British internationals.
sentences.cn: 历届冠军榜中包括很多英国世界冠军。

sentences.en: The pupils were asked to list the sports they loved most and hated most.
sentences.cn: 学生们被要求列出他们最喜欢的和最讨厌的运动。

sentences.en: We are making a list of the top ten men we would not want to be married to.
sentences.cn: 我们正在列一个我们最不想嫁的10种男人的名单。

sentences.en: You've given a whole list of names and addresses at the back.
sentences.cn: 你已经在末尾完整地列出了名字和地址。

words.tran_cn: 列出的；表列的；已登录的

phrases.tran_cn: 邮寄名单；发送文件清单
列个清单；列出单子；造表
adj. 在单子上，在名册中
候补名单；等候批准的申请人名单

trans.tran_en: a set of names, numbers etc, usually written one below the other, for example so that you can remember or check them

trans.tran_cn: 列举，把…列入单子，（尤指船）倾侧
trans.tran_en: To list several things such as reasons or names means to write or say them one after another, usually in a particular order
to write a list, or mention things one after the other
